Characteristic.Name: Age
Characteristic.Description: Usually recorded as date of birth

Characteristic.Name: Sex
Characteristic.Description: Sex (M/F) is asked for, gender not usually collected.

Characteristic.Name: Gender reassignment
Characteristic.Description: There are strict rules for collecting this data and it must be held in a way that it cannot be seen by anyone not directly involved in patient care.

Characteristic.Name: Marriage/Civil partnership
Characteristic.Description: Not usually asked for, unless relevant to patient care and support.

Characteristic.Name: Disability
Characteristic.Description: How and when this is collected varies across the system, patients may not identify with being disabled.

Characteristic.Name: Race
Characteristic.Description: Wouldn’t ask about Race in health settings, would ask patient for their ethnicity.

Characteristic.Name: Pregnancy/Maternity
Characteristic.Description: Not a census question but commonly asked in health settings, often in the format, ‘Are you currently pregnant or breastfeeding?’.

GenderIdentity.Option: Female (including male to female trans women)
Male (including female to male trans men)
